column_description: created year and month explained as 6 yyyymm digits
name of factory
grouped process line code
grouped process line name
name of plant
period of time when the plant is operated
preriod of time when the plant is unavailable or not operational
period of breakdown time of the plant
idle time which means a period of time when an asset or employee is available but not being productive
production quantity
defect quantity
frequency of breakdown
frequency of idle time
total period of production
ratio of work time which is calculated with this formula, work_time / nullif(work_time + downtime, 0) * 100
ratio of perfomance time which is calculated with this formula, total_standard_time / nullif(work_time, 0) * 100
ratio of non-defective products which is calculated with this formula, (work_qty - defect_qty) / nullif(work_qty, 0) * 100
ratio of idle time which is calculated with this formula, idle_time / nullif(work_time + downtime + idle_time, 0) * 100
ratio of breakdown time which is calculated with this formula, breakdown_time / nullif(work_time + downtime, 0) * 100
mean time between failures which represents facility reliability. Calculated with this formula, work_time / nullif(breakdown_cnt, 0)
mean time to repair which represents maintenance of equipment. Calculated with this formula, round(breakdown_time / nullif(breakdown_cnt, 0), 0)
account id who registrated this data
datetime when this data is registrated
